DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether acetazolamide are effective to reduce the length of mechanical ventilation in decompensated Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) patients developing pure or mixed metabolic alkalosis.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Acetazolamide for Reversal of Metabolic Alkalosis in Mechanically Ventilated Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine whether acetazolamide is effective to reduce the length of mechanical ventilation in decompensated COPD patients developing pure or mixed metabolic alkalosis.
DOC.criteria: Decompensated COPD on invasive mechanical ventilation Less than 24 hours
